page.title: 04CLUBS
page.content: Clubs The Ashridge Estate is run and organised by the local National Trust Group. The estate is managed by a Warden and his staff who run the woodlands as a commercial venture operating from a woodyard. Products include timber for fencing, gates and post in general. Many of the products come from the thinnings taken from the young plantations. Just off the square is a shop and information centre at the Bridgewater Momument. The Trust also sets out and maintains the woodlands for amenity use. This includes nature trails, footpaths and bridleways.
